title: Active Listening Skills
description: Train your ears to catch every detail and understand the nuances of spoken English.
info:
Course Info

Listening is an active skill. This course helps you stop translating in your head and start understanding English directly, distinguishing between listening for the big picture and listening for specifics.

quiz.question: When listening for the gist, what should you focus on?
quiz.correctFeedback: Exactly! The gist is the 'big picture'. Don't get stuck on words you don't know.
quiz.incorrectFeedback: Trying to understand every word often makes you lose the main point.
